description.p: Puddletag is an audio tag editor. Unlike most taggers for GNU/Linux, it uses a spreadsheet-like layout so that all the tags you want to edit by hand are visible and easily editable.
The usual tag editor features are supported like extracting tag information from filenames, renaming files based on their tags by using patterns and basic tag editing.

The usual tag editor features are supported:
Extracting tag information from filenames
Renaming files based on their tags by using patterns
Basic and batch tag editing
Automate repetitive tasks
Web lookups using Amazon (including cover art), Discogs (does cover art too!), FreeDB and MusicBrainz
